article.title: Sierra Nevada Tapped for Geo-Location Capabilities
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Sierra Nevada Corporation, Sparks, Nevada, was awarded about $7 million to provide geo-location training, development and delivery at Fort Bragg, North Carolina, with an estimated completion date of June 5, 2012.Â The Program Executive Office, Enterprise Information Systems, Technology Applications Office, Fort Detrick, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
